data.message: Trump supporter here and I'm not offended but I love the fact people get insanely butt hurt for him saying that "I've been a fan for a very long time but you brought politics in and blah blah blah" you people are pretty fucking retarded I guess everyone forgot about the song mosh? Fucking retards everyone has their opinions and views, what Obama came in office and everyone turned into the biggest pussies all getting offended and shit? Cry some more people. - now em - get to Cali for another concert it's been too long.
